verses.verse: <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from there toward the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5045>South,<s%> and <S%H3427>lived<s%> between <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> and <S%H7793>Shur.<s%> He lived as a <S%H1481>foreigner<s%> in <S%H1642>Gerar.<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4191>him,<s%> "Behold, you are a dead man, because of the <S%H802>woman<s%> whom you have <S%H3947>taken.<s%> For she is a <S%H1167>man<s%>'s <S%H1166>wife.<s%>"
Now <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> had not come <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H559>her.<s%> He said, <S%H136>"Lord,<s%> will you <S%H2026>kill<s%> even a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1471>nation?<s%>

<S%H559>Didn't<s%> he tell <S%H1931>me,<s%> 'She is my <S%H269>sister?<s%>' <S%H1931>She,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> <S%H559>herself,<s%> said, <S%H251><s%> 'He is my brother.' In the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> and the <S%H5356>innocence<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands<s%> have I done <S%H6213>this.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him in the <S%H2472>dream,<s%> <S%H1571>"Yes,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that in the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2820>this,<s%> and I also withheld you from <S%H2398>sinning<s%> against <S%H5414>me.<s%> Therefore I didn't allow you to touch <S%H5060>her.<s%>

Now <S%H7725>therefore,<s%> restore the <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%> For he is a <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and he will <S%H6419>pray<s%> for <S%H1157>you,<s%> and you will <S%H2421>live.<s%> If you <S%H7725>don't<s%> restore <S%H3045>her,<s%> know for <S%H4191>sure<s%> that you will <S%H4191>die,<s%> you, and all who are yours."

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> all his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H1696>told<s%> all these <S%H1697>things<s%> in their <S%H241>ear.<s%> The <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>scared.<s%>

Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6213>him,<s%> "What have you done to <S%H2398>us?<s%> How have I sinned against <S%H935>you,<s%> that you have brought on me and on my <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin?<s%> You have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H4639>deeds<s%> to me that ought not to be <S%H6213>done!<s%>"
<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> did <S%H7200>you<s%> <S%H6213>see,<s%> that you have done this <S%H1697>thing?<s%>"

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Because I <S%H559>thought,<s%> <S%H7535><s%> 'Surely the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is not in this <S%H4725>place.<s%> They will kill <S%H2026>me<s%> for my <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H1697>sake.<s%>'

<S%H546>Besides,<s%> she is indeed my <S%H269>sister,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H1>father,<s%> but not the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H517>mother;<s%> and she became my <S%H802>wife.<s%>

It <S%H430>happened,<s%> when God caused me to <S%H8582>wander<s%> from my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> that I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2617>her,<s%> 'This is your kindness which you shall <S%H6213>show<s%> to <S%H4725>me.<s%> Everywhere that we <S%H935>go,<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> of <S%H251>me,<s%> "He is my brother."'"

<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> male <S%H5650>servants<s%> and female <S%H8198>servants,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H7725>restored<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> to him.
<S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H776>"Behold,<s%> my land is before <S%H6440>you.<s%> <S%H3427>Dwell<s%> where it pleases <S%H2896>you.<s%>"

To <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>"Behold,<s%> I have given your <S%H251>brother<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver.<s%> <S%H3682>Behold,<s%> it is for you a covering of the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to all that are with <S%H3198>you.<s%> In front of all you are vindicated."

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and his female <S%H519>servants,<s%> and they bore <S%H3205>children.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6113>closed<s%> <S%H6113>up<s%> tight all the <S%H7358>wombs<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H40>Abimelech,<s%> <S%H1697>because<s%> of <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%>
